column2: Role Description: This is a full-time on-site role for a Head Swim Coach at VidyaVins located in Ballia. The Head Swim Coach will be responsible for day-to-day swim instruction, lessons, lifeguarding, and overall aquatics management. They will lead and develop swim programs, provide coaching and guidance to swimmers, ensure safety and compliance with pool regulations, and organize swim meets and events. Qualifications: Swim Instruction, Swimming, Swim Lessons, and Lifeguarding skills Experience in aquatics management Excellent communication and leadership skills Certifications in swim instruction, lifeguarding, and first aid Ability to work well with swimmers of all ages and skill levels Experience in organizing swim meets and events Passion for promoting water safety and a healthy lifestyle Experience in Sports Science, Physical Education, or related field

column2: Are you retired and would like to spend time learning and teaching in Government Schools? Calling all retired professionals! Make a difference in young girls' lives by sharing your expertise in government schools in Mumbai, Bengaluru, Raichur, and Goa. Join our team of mentors and educators dedicated to empowering the next generation of women.  Whether you're a retired engineer, artist, scientist, or entrepreneur, your knowledge and experience are invaluable and mean the world to us and the young people you meet at school. Inspire and guide girls as they explore life, sustainable enterprise, digital skills, and STEM skills applied to becoming start-up entrepreneurs who solve Climate Change.  Join us in creating a more inclusive and diverse educational environment where every girl has the opportunity to thrive.  Together, let's shape tomorrow's leaders and innovators. Contact us today to learn more about how you can make a meaningful impact as a mentor in schools. We have volunteer positions available, paid teaching positions, the opportunities are not remote, they are on site in Government Schools near where you live. All retired professionals who are workaholics and need a golden opportunity to return to work, give back to society, and teach, then here we are... We rehire the retired!   Going to School is hiring retired individuals from any background who are willing to be at School to teach young minds and equip them with STEM Skills  The program we are actively recruiting for is The Outdoor School for Girls You will  1. Visit Monday - Saturday, to a government school to teach girls in Grades 5-10 digital, life, sustainable enterprise and STEM skills. 2. Use mobile phones and technology, laptops, computers. 3. Communicate effectively in the local language, Hindi, Marathi, Kannada, Konkani (Mumbai - Hindi/Marathi, Bangalore and Raichur - English, Kannada and Hindi, Goa - Konkani And English) 4. Write reports in English, email, Word Qualification: Any Graduate/Undergraduate Student/Diploma Holders  Exp: Any  Volunteer, Part-time, and Full-time positions available, with the first month of training, learning together a month of on-site skills training with a consultant contract issued. Apply today. Call Pearl: at 7021067887 or mail me at pearl.barretto@goingtoschool.com and share your phone number, CV, where you are based, and what you'd like to teach and will be in touch.
